GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v6.0.16
GSD.description:
drivers: perf: marvell_cn10k: Fix hotplug callback leak in tad_pmu_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.16 by commit 367404bfd1aa87b2a50059cd8edc6c12c367cd15, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 036a7584bede317d0df6b854e4f531b7a2dd8b33. For more details please see the references link.
